info.title: Validated Healthcare Directory Server Capability Statement
info.description: This Capability Statement defines the expected capabilities of a validated healthcare directory FHIR server conforming to the Validated Healthcare Directory Implementation Guide.

/metadata.summary: Access to the Server's Capability Statement
/metadata.description: All FHIR Servers return a CapabilityStatement that describes what services they perform

get.summary: Return the server's capability statement

/Practitioner.summary: manage the collection of resources of type Practitioner
/Practitioner.description: Access to services to manage the collection of all resources of type Practitioner

get.summary: Search all resources of type Practitioner based on a set of criteria

parameters.name: qualification-wherevalid-location
parameters.description: Select Practitioners with a qualification that is valid at the specified location

parameters.name: active
parameters.description: Whether the practitioner record is active

parameters.name: phonetic
parameters.description: Select Practitioners with the specified name (A portion of name using some kind of phonetic matching algorithm)

/Practitioner/{rid}.summary: Read/Write/etc resource instance of type Practitioner
/Practitioner/{rid}.description: Access to services to manage the state of a single resource of type Practitioner

get.summary: Read the current state of the resource

ETag.description: Version from Resource.meta.version as a weak ETag

/Practitioner/{rid}/_history.summary: Read past versions of resource instance of type Practitioner
/Practitioner/{rid}/_history.description: Access to previous versions of a single resource of type Practitioner

get.summary: Read the past states of the resource

parameters.name: _since
parameters.description: Only include resource versions that were created at or after the given instant in time

parameters.name: _at
parameters.description: Only include resource versions that were current at some point during the time period specified in the date time value (see Search notes on date searching)

parameters.name: _list
parameters.description: Only include resource versions that are referenced in the specified list (current list references are allowed)

/Practitioner/{rid}/_history/{hid}.summary: Read a past version of resource instance of type Practitioner
/Practitioner/{rid}/_history/{hid}.description: Access a to specified previous version of a single resource of type Practitioner

get.summary: Read a past state of the resource

ETag.description: Version from Resource.meta.version as a weak ETag for that version

/Location.summary: manage the collection of resources of type Location
/Location.description: Access to services to manage the collection of all resources of type Location

get.summary: Search all resources of type Location based on a set of criteria

parameters.name: near
parameters.description:
Search for locations where the location.position is near to, or within a specified distance of, the provided coordinates expressed as [latitude]|[longitude]|[distance]|[units] (using the WGS84 datum, see notes).
If the units are omitted, then kms should be assumed. If the distance is omitted, then the server can use its own discretion as to what distances should be considered near (and units are irrelevant)

Servers may search using various techniques that might have differing accuracies, depending on implementation efficiency.

Requires the near-distance parameter to be provided also

get.summary: Search all resources of all types based on a set of criteria

parameters.name: _content
parameters.description: Search on the entire content of the resource

parameters.name: _id
parameters.description: Logical id of this artifact

parameters.name: _lastUpdated
parameters.description: When the resource version last changed

parameters.name: _security
parameters.description: Security Labels applied to this resource

parameters.name: _text
parameters.description: Search on the narrative of the resource

parameters.name: _query
parameters.description: A custom search profile that describes a specific defined query operation

summary.name: _summary
summary.description: Requests the server to return a designated subset of the resource

format.name: _format
format.description: Specify alternative response formats by their MIME-types (when a client is unable acccess accept: header)

pretty.name: _pretty
pretty.description: Ask for a pretty printed response for human convenience

elements.name: _elements
elements.description: Requests the server to return a collection of elements from the resource

count.name: _count
count.description: The maximum number of search results on a page. The server is not bound to return the number requested, but cannot return more
